title: Create Powerful CSS Animation Effects without JavaScript
Traits: Rust’s unifying concept
description: Rust’s traits, which come from Haskell’s type classes, are a single concept that unifies all of this: Interfaces Abstract classes Mix-ins Operator overloading Constraints on generics / Concepts Behavioral markers / Attributes (bonus) Method overloading This is amazing! Every other language I’ve used [1] has had some subset of the list above. I don’t think […]
